channel.title: Plz Help me, Cache files are mass downloaded OVER AND OVER, Plzzzzz
channel.description:
Hello, I'm new to MoparScape and I don't really know how to operate the client. :P I've downloaded the 3.2 moparscape client already. It say to download 16mb of cache files. it finished, yet it auto shuts itself. and when I reopen it, it say to download the cache files again... :|
I don't know what to do ...
I can't search for it.... I tried searching but failed...
Please Help me :D
Thanks.
TYNE :o

item.title: Plz Help me, Cache files are mass downloaded OVER AND OVER, Plzzzzz
item.dc:creator: @tyne tyne
item.description:
@tyne wrote:

It’s still going to download all that thingy …

Thanks though.

like this: Downloading the 16mb cache file just once, please be patient.
Downloading c:/windows/.mpr_file_store_32/cache.zip…
